synopsis.text:
Miyuki Kasahara and Ayumu Aizawa are on a mission to restore the former glory of Union School's Circlet Bout Club, and they're about to get some unexpected help. In a world transformed by virtual and augmented reality, the competitive sport of Circlet Bout (CB) has emerged as a game-changer. This e-sport, powered by a cutting-edge 'mixed reality system,' has become a deciding factor in the wealth and prestige of schools, with students' academic and athletic abilities equally important.

Enter Yuuka Sasaki, a high school girl with a burning passion for Circlet Bout. After a chance encounter with Japan's top player, Chikage Fujimura, Yuuka finds herself tied in an intense match despite her lack of experience. This electrifying event sparks her determination to become a CB player and face Chikage again. Two years later, Yuuka arrives in Tokyo and enrolls in Union School, eager to chase her dream.

However, upon her arrival, she discovers that the school's CB club is in shambles. Teaming up with Miyuki and Ayumu, Yuuka sets out to reopen the club and revive its once-legendary status. Will they succeed in their quest, and will Yuuka finally get her rematch with Chikage? Join this dynamic trio as they navigate the thrilling world of Circlet Bout in this near-future anime adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
